channel.title: Coaching on GracefulHR
channel.description: Recent content in Coaching on GracefulHR

item.title: Leading in a transformational way
item.description: Transformational leadership is about inspiring and empowering people, not just managing tasks. Learn the five key behaviors that define outstanding leaders and how to apply them in modern, distributed teams.

item.title: Five simple ways managers can boost team engagement
item.description: Engaged employees are more productive and innovative. Learn five simple ways managers can boost team engagement and performance.
